name: Crazy Piggies 3d Simulator games
description:
Crazy Piggies 3d Simulator

Its about survival and smashing in car. All happening is high quality 3D.
You can also play missions where you must hunt around for various objects,car, lights, signs. etc. Chase down the people,cars.
Step into this funny open world animal simulator game where you control an overly ambitious feline and help him grow into a giant.
Each level has its own unique elements.
The ultimate goal is to do as much damage as possible to maximize your score.
Some go ahead and give this funny Simulator Game a try.
Crazy piggies 3d simulator will not let you down.
Play as a real crazy pig - run, destroy, demolish and make the biggest rampage this world has ever seen.
When you press Tap to play button in the menu you always go to the scene where you can change your pig.
It is free to play game and download.....


Top Game Features Include:-

--4 Massive Maps to explore

--Desert maps, City and Farm Settings

--Excellent sound effects

--High Quality 3D graphics and exciting gameplay.

--3 Different pig breeds to try
